subject: Shipping
description_text: My package keeps getting delayed and I contacted ups support, they said they can get a shipping refund but the shipper needs to contact them not the recipient. The order # is #SSN1923

conversations.body_text: Hi Jordan Schmidt,     Your package will be delivered in the next two days and UPS will not do a shipping refund unless the item is lost or damaged. https://t.17track.net/en#nums=1ZH912Y00304332927
